thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 6 of 293
thread.title: Samuel Carnes

author: Samuel Carnes
title: Samuel Carnes
text: I'm feeling a bit nervous, going through the pre-order process with them of a limited edition item that seems to be fluctuating in stock back in Japan. I feel very in the dark throughout the whole thing. Their customer support however has been very supportive and prompt, which is assuring. Overall I would view the company positively, and would not consider this experience typical of their standard practices.
